message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  We can work things out from here.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  This still gives you a significant sum, and avoids us dragging this out and losing value to inflation.
Okay, let's split the difference.  I'll take 65%, you take 35%. If we don't agree now, we'll both lose more money to inflation.
